title: s6 ranked rewards
body: i got removed my previous season rewards and i didnt recieve recieve this season rewards, i never got banned

replies.body: Same with me, it seems everybody has their rewards except me. And my previous season's are gone also.
men it sucks... i want dat plat border and that sweet maokai skin
Same, I worked my ass off to get to Plat IV, and now everybody has them, and I am left border-less like some noob.

me too lol, do your rewards also say on the leagues tab, no rewards earned? 

http://imgur.com/a/vkrMM

No. Like I mentioned, it still looks like Season 6 never ended:
http://i96.photobucket.com/albums/l162/darktemplar32489/stillS6.png

We're still sending out rewards to players!  I haven't received mine either yet and waiting with anticipation, so don't worry! :P  Per the [Season 6 FAQ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/2016-ranked-season-ends-soon), rewards will be sent out within two weeks of the end of the season, so give it until the 21st.  Hang tight and our rewards will come!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=lujtaYd2,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-10T16:54:32.132+0000)
>
> We're still sending out rewards to players!  I haven't received mine either yet and waiting with anticipation, so don't worry! :P  Per the [Season 6 FAQ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/2016-ranked-season-ends-soon), rewards will be sent out within two weeks of the end of the season, so give it until the 21st.  Hang tight and our rewards will come!

I did receive my rewards and maokai but not Victorious Maokai, is that normal?
Yeah, you might not receive everything right away and some may see their rewards before others.  Hang tight, they are coming!
